summary: Really awesome sword that turns enemies against themselves in a theatrically pleasing way!
descriptionHtml:
An awesome little mod that adds a sword that strikes the target with a furious rage attacking everything, doubling their attack damage, movement speed and weapon damage.

The target will slowly pledge it's life to you - it's health slowly regenerates your own until when it finally dies, you capture it's soul in a furious, high-damage fiery explosion.

Caution!! Enemies struck will tear not just your enemies apart, but also yourself! The scream of madness will cause them to rip an area to pieces, and if you don't get out of the way, you'll die very quickly indeed!

Just activate the mod in NMM and use the following codes to add it:

help madness
player.additem XX000d62 1

XX being the number of the mod in your game.

The weapon's enchantment can be learnt and applied to other weapons!

Please do let me know if I made any mistakes, I'll do my best to fix them :-)
author: Milanes
